rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with natural light and ventilation.
Spacious living room adjacent to the central courtyard for communal activities.
Adjacent to the living area and connected to the kitchen via a short corridor.
Modern kitchen with ventilation system ensuring good air quality.
Large bedroom offering ample space and privacy, oriented according to Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.
Small bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom.
